Ms. Gates noted there are many controversial topics being discussed at the state level including the wearing of masks, Critical Race Theory and the required sex education training.
  5.4 Discussion on Equity versus Critical Race Theory
Dr. Cloninger shared a presentation on Equity versus Critical Race Theory. ESSB 5044 (which created a new section of 28.345 RCW) titled AN ACT Relating to equity, cultural competency, and dismantling institutional racism in the public school system, is a bill pass

Finally, a brief comment on CRT. In my teaching career it was never a contentious issue; much
like our children getting their vaccinations for school. Culturally relevant teaching has not
changed, nor has making all students feel safe and supported no matter their cultural
background. Responsible teaching of our history including racial equality and inequality needs
to be addressed and discussed. You can’t come to the truth and understand the cultural diversity

APPROVAL OF AGENDA:

Motion was made by Darrin Belton, second by Thomas Fender
to approve the agenda. All in favor motion carried.
